data.text:
Question

Antoine Henri Becquerel was awarded the Nobel Prize in 1903 for.

Investigating the absorption of light by crystals

Diffraction of X-rays

Discovering spontaneous radioactivity

Demonstrating the influence of earth's magnetic field on its atmosphere
